name: Paint and take your own art work of Madrid special sightseeings
description: There's no doubt that Madrid has beautiful sightseeings and a wonderful light that has inspired many artists around the world. If you are fond of such things as: sketching, drawing, painting, watercolors and taking your time in each place to observe, this is a great plan for you, even if you are professional, beginner or just an urbansketcher.
